items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
items.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: ClipX.js is a lightweight JavaScript library for efficient clipboard management, text manipulation, and user feedback. It offers simple copy, cut, and paste operations, basic text formatting, and built-in toast notifications with customizable messages, all in a compact package.
items.title: mraxays/clipxjs: ClipX.js is a lightweight JavaScript library for efficient clipboard management, text manipulation, and user feedback. It offers simple copy, cut, and paste operations, basic text formatting, and built-in toast notifications with customizable messages, all in a compact package.

items.content_html: A simple and lightweight Vue.js chart library for creating basic, customizable charts. Supports line, bar, and area charts with easy configuration and responsive design. Perfect for adding quick, minimalistic charts to your Vue applications.

items.content_html: This project is a lightweight, web-based Markdown previewer built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It leverages Marked.js to convert Markdown input into HTML in real time and Highlight.js to add syntax highlighting to code blocks

items.content_html: A lightweight, fast, and optimized React application powered by Vite. This project leverages Vite’s blazing-fast build system for instant hot module replacement (HMR), minimal bundle size, and enhanced developer experience.

items.content_html: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for a CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware...
